items.text: length, plants the foot across and dabs to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: defends a length ball down the pitch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: advances down the ground and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: plants the foot forward and eases a push to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: swings and misses as the ball nips away from him outside off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: quick dab-and-run to mid-off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: stays back to a length ball and punches to cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length, angled in, guides it to midwicket
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of length, whips from outside off to midwicket
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: full on the fourth-stump line, pushed straight back
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: presses forward and the ball slides in to take the inside of the bat to the left of the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: punched off the backfoot to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: advances to force a punch but the ball goes behind the stumps off the inside edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full, comes forward and defends back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full, just outside off, pushed back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, driven to wide long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: Pradeep : "Oh boy, you got to love this Shahzad guy. In a world full of fitness freaks and six packs, I love watching this guy play. Pure love for cricket oozing all over"
items.text: wide fullish ball, opens the face to deep backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on off, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of length, opens the face to deep backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: shortish, angled in, punched to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length outside off, opens the face to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched down the ground
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up on middle, driven back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: gets forward to meet a length ball and punches to the gap at cover, Shhazad denies the single

items.text: flighted outside off, chops a cut to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run
